name: OFFICIAL POKEMON IMPORTER
description: Pokemon Sword and Shield is releasing, brothers and sisters, and GAME FRIDGE sin't listening to us, loyal baby gamers. They lost their secret import tools, and forgot to add half of pokemons into their new games. But it's easy! It's so easy... It takes a few minutes per Pokemon. And now, science is proving it. Here is an Official Pokemon Importer! Bam, done. Easy.
